children.name: endValue
Zooming an element in to 50% scale

children.description: Sets the initial **scale** value of the element.1 means the element will be displayed its real size.2 means the element will be scaled twice.0.1 (or less) means that the element will be zoomed out.

children.name: startValue
Zooming an element out, starting from 50%

children.description: Sets the initial **scale** value of the element.1 means the element will be displayed its real size.2 means the element will be scaled twice.0.1 (or less) means that the element will be zoomed out.
